title.narrative: NDI Ukraine "Promoting Inclusion and Combatting Discrimination" 2021-2024
NDI Ukraine "Promoting Inclusion and Combatting Discrimination" 2021-2024

description.narrative:
Objectives
This is a 36-month project with four objectives:
Objective 1 - Increase the capacity of key governmental bodies tasked with promoting gender-responsive approaches to policymaking.
Intermediate Result 1.1 Gender advocates, including parliament, government bodies, and CSOs demonstrate increased collaboration to advance gender equality.
Objective 2 - Increase public understanding of the benefits of gender equality at the national level.
Intermediate Result 2.1 Ukrainian citizens have increased exposure to gender-responsive messaging.
Objective 3 LGBTQ CSOs promote increased tolerance of LGBTQ people through sustained outreach and advocacy campaigns.
Intermediate Result 3.1 - LGBTQ CSOs form coalitions around shared priorities to advocate for legislative changes and/or corporate policies and practices to support LGBTQ people.
Intermediate Result 3.2 LGBTQ CSOs broaden support base for LGBTQ inclusion through evidence-based public outreach efforts to combat discrimination toward LGBTQ people.
Intermediate Result 3.3 - Improve CSOs ability to sustain efforts combating discrimination toward LGBTQ people.
Objective 4 - Gender equality and LGBTQ inclusion movements jointly address intersectional issues.
Intermediate Result 4.1 - Leaders of the LGBTQ inclusion and the gender equality movements partner to expand their networks.

The goal of the project is to promote greater inclusion in Ukraine’s political processes among women and members of the LGBTQ+ communities. This is a 36-month program with four objectives:
Objective 1 - Increase the capacity of key governmental bodies tasked with promoting gender-responsive approaches to policymaking.
Objective 2 - Increase public understanding of the benefits of gender equality at the national level.
Objective 3 – LGBTQ+ CSOs promote increased tolerance of LGBTQ+ people through sustained outreach and advocacy campaigns.
Objective 4 - Gender equality and LGBTQ+ inclusion movements jointly address intersectional issues.

The goal of the project is to promote greater inclusion in Ukraine’s political processes among women and members of the LGBTQ+ communities. This is a 36-month program with four objectives:
Objective 1 - Increase the capacity of key governmental bodies tasked with promoting gender-responsive approaches to policymaking.
Objective 2 - Increase public understanding of the benefits of gender equality at the national level.
Objective 3 – LGBTQ+ CSOs promote increased tolerance of LGBTQ+ people through sustained outreach and advocacy campaigns.
Objective 4 - Gender equality and LGBTQ+ inclusion movements jointly address intersectional issues.

sector.narrative: Women’s rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

tag.narrative: 5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
